Reference

All functions

decisions()

Add discounts to a twig Markov object

event()

Add event mapping

payoffs()

Add final_outcomes from a decision tree to a twig

`+`(<twig_class>)

Define a method for the + operator for twig objects

prob2rate()

Title

rate2prob()

Title

states()

Add Markov states to a twig

tunnel2state()

Title

twig()

Create a new twig

twig_build()

Builds a Markov model

twig_build(<twig_decision>)

Build a decision tree structure

twig_build(<twig_markov>)

Build a Markov model structure

twig_evaluate()

Runs a decision tree or Markov model

twig_evaluate(<twig_decision>)

Runs the decision tree

twig_evaluate(<twig_markov>)

Runs the markov model

twig_expand_functions()

Title

twig_gen_model_function()

Runs a decision tree or Markov model

twig_gen_model_function(<twig_decision>)

Title

twig_gen_model_function(<twig_markov>)

Runs the markov model

twig_parse()

Parses a twig model formula structure

twig_parse(<twig_decision>)

Parses a twig Decision Tree object

twig_parse(<twig_markov>)

Parses a twig Markov object
